headline: OMP's AI-driven Unison Planning(TM) Platform Enhances Supply Chain Agility for McCormick & Co.
summary: ATLANTA, GEORGIA / ACCESS Newswire / December 3, 2025 /OMP is helping McCormick & Co., the global leader in flavor, with an AI-driven and autonomous operational planning initiative. This partnership enables McCormick to manage both assembly-to-order ...

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid MKC and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, McCormick’s shares have sunk to $65.43, producing a disappointing 10.8% loss - a stark contrast to the S&P 500’s 14.1% gain. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
